Interface EnemyFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomBossFactory, RandomDifficultEnemyFactory, RandomEnemyFactory
public interface EnemyFactory
Interface for creating enemies in the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ArrayList<Enemy>
    enemiesAvailable
    List of all enemies available in the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Enemy
    create()
    Creates a new enemy instance.
    default void
    initializeAllEnemiesAvailable()
    Initializes the list of all available enemies by adding an instance of each enemy type defined in the Enemies enumeration.

  • Field Details

    • enemiesAvailable

      static final ArrayList<Enemy> enemiesAvailable
      List of all enemies available in the game. By default, this is a static and final field.

  • Method Details

    • create

      Enemy create()
      Creates a new enemy instance.
      Returns:
      The newly created enemy.

    • initializeAllEnemiesAvailable

      default void initializeAllEnemiesAvailable()
      Initializes the list of all available enemies by adding an instance of each enemy type defined in the Enemies enumeration.
